name: ukb23374_wgs_qc_applet

inputSpec.name: ukb23374_vcf_list
inputSpec.label: VCF list
inputSpec.help: Input file ID (hash file-xxxxx). Contains a list of vcf file IDs from field 23374, one per line

inputSpec.name: qc_output_dir
inputSpec.label: Output directory
inputSpec.help: Where to save the output files

inputSpec.name: parallel_qc_jobs
inputSpec.label: Parallel VCF QC jobs
inputSpec.help: Number of files to process in parallel

outputSpec.name: qc_log_file
outputSpec.label: Log file
outputSpec.help: Gzipped text file with concatenated logs.

title: GraphTyper WGS QC Applet
summary: WGS QC applet. Takes a list of vcf file IDs in a single file runs a bunch of pre-defined filters. The output is plink2 files and some other qc metrics.
